paragraphs.text:
%python
import astropy
from pyvo.dal import TAPService

tap = TAPService("http://tap.roe.ac.uk/vsa/")
query_text = """ SELECT top 1000000 * FROM VHSDR6.vhsSource"""
results = tap.search(query_text, maxrec="20000000", mode="sync")
results
